Real Madrid are ready to seal a cut-price €30 million deal for Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez in the January transfer window, according to Don Balon.

The Chilean is out of contract in summer 2018 and with it not looking likely he will extend his stay at Emirates Stadium, the Gunners are willing to sell to Zinedine Zidane's side for a small fee.

REAL MADRID TO MAKE £80M MARTIAL BID

Real Madrid will make an £80 million offer for Anthony Martial next summer, according to The Mirror.

The 21-year-old striker has repeatedly voiced his desire for regular first-team football at Old Trafford, but has started just five Premier League games this term. Madrid are hoping to capitalise on his frustrations and lure him to the Spanish capital.
